review_data.title: Ganz ok

review_data.title: Delicious Indian food - Best in the town
review_data.content: We were in Zurich for a week on a vacation and this place is "the best in town". You get tasty homely Indian food at affordable price. I loved the veg meal, kottu parota, samosa and vada and yes, these were the food we tasted.The...More

review_data.title: Very tasty food, friendly people
review_data.content: We had a nice dinner, Kottu roti, which was a very big portion which was big enough for 2 people. Reasonable price and very tasty. They accept cash only, but there is an ATM just around the corner.

review_data.title: Tasty Indian food
review_data.content: Very good n tasty Indian food.. Very reasonable rates compared to Zurich standards... It's a bit difficult to find... But try out once

review_data.title: Fast & Delicious

review_data.title: Authentische Küche
review_data.content: Sehr gutes essen. Ich gehe immer wieder gerne hierhin. Portion langt für 2. Ausserdem sehr günstig für Zürich. Danke :-)

review_data.title: "Serves Your soul "

review_data.title: Take away - Very good
review_data.content: We Indian friends looking for Indian restaurants and after struggling to find one, we found this at middle of street- street food, so thought would give it a try, delicious and good portion. Don't be afraid to try cheaper option when its good :)

review_data.title: Value for money!

review_data.title: Very good value for money!
review_data.content: Very small indian food stand at Langstrasse with super delicious indian food (I took lamb curry). Huge portions. And surprisingly cheap for Zürich. Should definitely give it a try if you walk by!

review_data.title: Highly recommended

review_data.title: Very good!
review_data.content: Hole in the wall type place (more for takeaways). The people are super friendly and the food is really good. Had the daal and chicken curry - super tasty and not at all expensive!

review_data.title: Lovely as always!
review_data.content: As you'll see from my previous reviews, this place is one of my favorite curry houses. Suresh and his wife serve homemade Tamil curries, freshly cooked on a daily basis. I always go for a lamb curry, which is normally served with a seasonal vegetable...More

review_data.title: Lovely Lovely Lovely

review_data.title: Excellent Sri Lankan curries...
